name: Island Burger
author: Anonymous
summary: Thousand Island dressing is the perfect burger condiment - made with mayonnaise, ketchup and sweet pickle, it includes all the best burger condiments in one bottle! Spread this on your bun, top each with a well-seasoned burger, and tuck in to a great tasting dinner any night of the week.
ingredients: ¼ cup A.1. Original Steak Sauce
⅓ cup KRAFT Thousand Island Dressing
directions: Preheat greased grill to medium heat
Mix meat, 2 tablespoons of the steak sauce, onion and garlic
Grill patties 7 to 9 minutes on each side or until cooked through (160 degrees F)
Spread bottom half of each bun with 1 tablespoon of the dressing mixture; cover with burger and top of bun
